titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: TPRG-SEND TWO YEAR CORRECTED AGE OUTCOME ASSESSMENT SCORE (NEUROSENSORY QUESTION B) - Description

body.p: TPRG-SEND TWO YEAR CORRECTED AGE OUTCOME ASSESSMENT SCORE (NEUROSENSORY QUESTION B) is the PERSON SCORE for question B of the Neurosensory section of the TPRG-SEND Two Year Corrected Age Outcome Assessment .
The question asks "Does this child have hearing impairment corrected by aids?".
